abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton calls again on Pakistan to shut down safe havens from which extremists have mounted attacks in Afghanistan.
snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton for a second day called on Pakistan’s government to shut down safe havens from which extremists have mounted attacks in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton for a second day called on Pakistan’s government to shut down safe havens from which extremists have mounted attacks in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Clinton Widens Audience in Pakistan, but Sticks to Tough Message
headline.print_headline: Clinton Widens Audience in Pakistan, but Sticks to Tough Message
headline.seo: Clinton Prods Pakistan Again on Extremists’ Havens
